summary: Animations to go whit Staves of Skyrim. Mainly whit shield staves. Lore-freanly tweaked vanilla animations. More versions will be added later.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]As per request of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4302054/?tb=feed&pUp=1 MSFOXHOUND/][b]MSFoxhound[/b][/url] I have made (well i didnt made them from scratch so i guess tweaked) animations to use with [/size][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22691/?][size=5]Staves of Skyrim[/size][/url]. 

[size=3][b]Currently there only is LITE version. It means that these animations are all lore-freandly and go together whit vanilla ones. Also shield staves are basically regular shields whit diffrent mesh and they use shield animations. So I made this LITE version to make it look decent for both. 
[u]New animations include running and walking while dual wielding normal staves, running and walking wielding normal and shield staves and new block idle, bash, and powerbash.[/u]
As always back up any animations my mod tries to replace in case you dont like my animations.[/b][/size]

[size=3][b]If you want only blocking animations and not the idles or dual wielding then donwload manually, extract and put in \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations only the animations whit shd_ in front of them. For example shd_blockidle.hkx, shd_blockbashpower.hkx, etc.[/b][/size]


[youtube]7HAfQDMx5pk[/youtube]  
[size=1]Animations shown in video in this order;
staff_idle.hkx
staffright_idle.hkx

When dual wielding staves and similar when using shield or shield staff.
staffmagic_walkarm.hkx
staffmagicright_walkarm.hkx

When dual wielding staves and similar when using shield or shield staff.
staffmagic_runarm.hkx
staffmagicright_runarm.hkx

When using shield or shield staff.
shd_blockidle.hkx
shd_blockbashintro.hkx (this is played between idle and bash or powerbash)
shd_blockbashpower.hkx
shd_blockbash.hkx

Not shown.
shd_blockhit.hkx (when you get hit while blocking)
shd_blockhit_vara.hkx (diffrent variant)
shd_blockhit_varb.hkx
shd_blockbashsprint.hkx (when using shield charge)[/size]

[size=3][b]*Compatibility[/b][/size]
If you use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28428/?/][b][size=3]New animation for Magic casting v0-8[/size][/b][/url]  then these files will conflic

staff_idle.hkx
staffrigh_idle.hkx
staffmagic_runarm.hkx
staffmagic_walkarm.hkx
staffmagicright_runarm.hkx
staffmagicright_walkarm.hkx

No problem. If you like  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/183089/?tb=feed&pUp=1/][b]xp32[/url]\'s[/b] animations better then dont replace them. These are walking and runing animations as the name suggests. 



[size=3][b]*Requirements[/b][/size]
I highly suggest you use this whit [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22691/?][size=3]Staves of Skyrim[/size][/url]. . Why? Because if you dont then whats the point from these animations?  Ofcourse these are just animations so they will work even whitout that mod. 


[size=3][b]*NOTE[/b][/size]
There is no custom sprinting animation whit shield staff. Yes, yes once again I uploaded an incomplete mod whit one animation missing. Well I really didnt want to but I already pushed the upload back for a day just so I could fix it. Seems like I cant, yet. Also I will have math exam soon so I want this mod to be off my mind for now.
Its kinda hard to explain but when I make it look good whit shield staff and normal staff suddently one handed sprint gets a loop bug or camera glitch. So please be patient till I figure it out.

[size=3][b]*Install[/b][/size] whit NMM or manually ----- \\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations 
 
[size=3][b]*NOTE - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34950//?/]Immersive Animations [/url] users!!![/b][/size]
Dont allow this mod to replace shd_blockbashsprint.hkx  Immersive Animations shield charge animation goes well together whit shield staves. Or  replace it really doesnt matter that much.

[size=3][b]*Credits[/b][/size]
Bethesda for making vanilla animations 
Armor in screenshots is Runic Spellbinder Armor from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3656551/?]hothtrooper44[/url]
author: krish698
